articles.title: The most popular air travel day this year was a mess. That won't change anytime soon
articles.description: Americans gained a new federal holiday last year: Juneteenth. This year the holiday, which commemorates of the end of slavery in the United States, falls on Sunday but it will be observed in many places on Monday, June 20.

articles.title: Mortgage rates are soaring. Here's what that means for home buyers - CNN Video
articles.description: This week's mortgage rate jump to nearly 6% makes homes even more expensive. But will soaring rates finally bring the housing market back to earth? CNN Business' Matt Egan joins 'Nightcap's' Jon Sarlin to break it all down.

articles.title: What to know about Juneteenth now that it's a federal holiday
articles.description: Despite Juneteenth's storied history, the holiday was largely overlooked by non-Black Americans until recent years. With Juneteenth now a national holiday, it's worth reflecting on its history.
